item.title: McDonald's plans AI expansion to streamline customer orders, executive says
item.description: McDonald's uses AI to verify orders at 400 India locations and plans to roll out the system worldwide in two years to improve accuracy and operations

item.title: NYC cleaning lady describes terrifying face-to-face encounter with gunman: 'I was so scared'
item.description: New York City cleaning lady Sebije Nelovic is speaking out about her chilling encounter with gunman Shane Tamura during the 345 Park Avenue shooting.
